snippet: Top seed Andy Murray struggled to a 7-6 (8), 7-6 (1) victory over Nicolas Mahut of France to begin the defense of his title at the Queen's Club on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: Top seed Andy Murray struggled to a 7-6 (8), 7-6 (1) victory over Nicolas Mahut of France to begin the defense of his title at the Queen's Club on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Murray Struggles to Win Over Mahut
headline.main: Murray Struggles to Win Over Mahut
